item.description:
To celebrate the hard work that Malyna has put in over the last 2 years, we'll be having a gathering to thank her. We'll also be celebrating that the group has been around long enough to have over 300 events.

If you have never been to an event, this will be a great way to meet a lot of new people and chat.

The Avery is nice neighborhood bar on the west side of Providence. Hang out for a few drinks and decide where the rest of the evening will be held...8)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the back left corner.
item.name: 2 Years of Organizing and over 300 events!
